snippet: The Japanese Parliament approved Prime Minister Yoshihiko Noda’s plan to double the sales tax and address national debt, but only after he made a promise to hold elections “soon.”
abstract: Japanese Parliament approves Prime Min Yoshihiko Noda’s plan to double the sales tax and address national debt, but only after he promises to hold elections soon.
lead_paragraph: The Japanese Parliament approved Prime Minister Yoshihiko Noda’s plan to double the sales tax and address national debt, but only after he made a promise to hold elections “soon.”

headline.seo: Japan Parliament Passes Sales Tax Increase
headline.main: Japan Sales Tax Increase Passed, on Pledge of Early Election
headline.print_headline: Japan Sales Tax Increase Passed, on Pledge of Early Election
